this_title: Gold Mountain: Chinese in the Old West
introduction: 由中央电视台纪录频道与美国Roller Coaster Road公司联合摄制的3集纪录片《金山》，力图通过戏剧性的再现和有创造性地运用19世纪的史料，描绘在美国的中国移民的生活，讲述中国人对美国西部建设所做的贡献及《排华法案》所产生的巨大影响。Gold Mountain is an epic three-hour exploration of America’s first Chinese immigrants. From the gold rush to the building of the railroads, to the violence and prejudice they overcame, Gold Mountain tells the story of how these early pioneers defied the odd...
foreign_title: Gold Mountain: Chinese in the Old West
